P1909 [NOIP2016 普及组] 买铅笔

Written on December 26th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n;
    int a1,a2,b1,b2,c1,c2;
    cin>>n>>a1>>a2>>b1>>b2>>c1>>c2;
    int x,y,z;
    x=n/a1+1;
    y=n/b1+1;
    z=n/c1+1;
    if(n%a1==0)
    {
    	x=x-1;
    }
    if(n%b1==0)
    {
    	y=y-1;
    }
    if(n%c1==0)
    {
    	z=z-1;
    }
    x=x*a2;
    y=y*b2;
    z=z*c2;  
    if(x<y)
    {
    	if(x<z)
    	{
    		cout<<x<<endl;
    	}
    	else
    	{
    		cout<<z<<endl;
    	}
    }
    else
    {
    	if(y<z)
    	{
    		cout<<y<<endl;
    	}
    	else
    	{
    		cout<<z<<endl;
    	}
    }
    return 0;
}
Feel free to share!
